name: PianoCube!
description:
Memorization of cube algorithms may be difficult. Music is very easy to memorize. Double your muscle memory and add new neurons to your brain!

Every melody is an algorithm and every algorithm is a melody. Find new algorithms or compose some music just by turning the 2×2×2 or 3×3×3 cube! Create cube patterns using musical patterns!

PianoCube! is a great and unique tool for beginners, intermediates and advanced cubers.

Main features:
◈ Play and solve 8 different cubes
◈ Play a preset or a custom keyboard
◈ Timer, turn metric, scramble and reset functions
◈ Progress and preferences autosave function
◈ Change the cube and its design on the fly
◈ Choose your preferred instrument and app theme
◈ Swap to portrait or landscape mode while playing
◈ Swap or hide the keyboard on the fly
◈ Ad-Free
